recipesJson.name: Strawberry Cookie
recipesJson.author: EdibleMalfunction
recipesJson.description:
Delicious as a shake and vape, this is a another recipe of mine to show how amazing CAP Sugar Cookie really is.

Add Sweetener at 0.25 to 0.5 % if you so desire

reviews.text: Contrary to madlyfe's review, I get mostly sugar cookie.  Didn't notice any problems with it off the SNV.  It's a decent mix, just not really my thing.  If you have the flavors and like the profile, mix it up.
This is a little dry for my taste, but that's not to say the recipe is bad.
Delicious! Didn't enjoy it much as shake and vape but after three days it's just great. Shows that you don't have to over complicate your recipe to get there.
A little harsh as Shake'n'Vape. After 2 days steeping a delicious strawberry cookie. Can't put it down.
Really enjoying this mix. The flavors really meld together to give you a strawberry towards the front and the sugar cookie at the end. Definitely a good ADV. give this one a try
The best part about this recipe is how the sugar cookie just compliments the strawberry and doesn't dominate the mix. I'm really glad I mixed this up!
this is a nice mix. not sure i really get any sugar cookie. the blend is nice though.
Really enjoying this one - simple and delicious.
